title: The Villain’s Regression Survival Method - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Psychological   Shounen Ai
tags: Fantasy Creatures   Gore   Hunters   Modern Day   Monsters   Special Abilities
author: Ji Seo Eum   지서음
description:
mankind extinct by one man  In the suddenly floating system, Eui Hyun returns to the unwanted past.

“Don’t you think you should be loved by me? I have to work hard to hear you say you love me.”

“Don’t be ridiculous. I don’t have that taste.”

Eui Hyun who is neither dead or alive tries to kill Jae Yi, the culprit, to escape from the hopeless infinite return. For some reason, it always fails.

“…I’ll help you. I don’t want to make you regret it.”

“You don’t need to do anything. Stay still. The more incompetent you become, the better for me.”

Who is the villain? His relationship with the people around him has changed dramatically from the past and the secret events that are revealed to the surface. What happened in the past?

Do you know what it means? To kill God, make him love you.

Will Eui Hyun be able to escape from the infinite return of Jae Yi’s love?>
